page.title: 05A PUPIL'S VIEW OF SCHOOL.
page.content: WE HAVE TO BE AT SCHOOL AT NINE O'CLOCK . IF WE GET THERE EARLY ENOUGH WE CAN PLAY OUTSIDE UNTIL NINE O'CLOCK.WHEN WE COME IN WE HAVE ASSEMBLY.IN ASSEMBLY THE HEADMASTER READS US A STORY AND WE SAY PRAYERS AND SING SONGS.AFTER ASSEMBLY WE HAVE MATHS AND THEN WE GO OUT TO PLAY AT TEN THIRTY.WE COME IN AT TEN FIFTY.AFTER PLAY WE DO ENGLISH.WE GO OUT TO PLAY AGAIN AT TWELVE O'CLOCK.WE HAVE DINNER AT QUARTER PAST TWELVE.AFTER DINNER WE GO OUT TO PLAY AGAIN.AT ONE O'CLOCK WE COME IN AND DO HISTORY.WE GO OUT TO PLAY AT QUARTER PAST TWO AND COME IN AT HALF PAST TWO AND DO ART.THEN AT HALF PAST THREE WE GO HOME.
